articles.title: Rahul attacks BJP after Karnataka HC judge says he was threatened with transfer
articles.description: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi on Tuesday targeted the BJP over the statement of a Karnataka high court judge hearing a matter related to a bribery case that he was being threatened with transfer and accused the saffron party of bulldozing ''institution after i…
